reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, silky, and soft, appreciating its versatility for family weddings. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality and flattering fit, with one customer noting it can be dressed up or down. However, the fit and color receive mixed reviews - while some find it perfect, others say it's too short, and while many like the color, some mention it's not white as expected. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars VERY flattering dress for a wedding party!
items.body: This dress is SO flattering! I'm 5'5". 186 lbs, and the XL is just perfect on me. It makes me feel pretty. The skirt is a bit wrinkly, so I ordered it in the dark blue and will return the white. It feels like good quality, and it has pockets! I'll probably own a few of these by year's end. Read more
items.author: Book Club Queen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress
items.body: Love this dress! It is so versatile. I bought it to wear to a wedding and dressed it up with a 2” wide belt with a rhinestone buckle. The fit was perfect for me, runs true to size. The fabric is lightweight and silky, not see through at all. Read more
items.author: Bronsue

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fit for thinner woman
items.body: Not for a woman who is trying to minimize the look of her stomach. Hourglass figure appropriate. Shoulders too big and waist too small. Would not recommend unless you look like the model. Read more
items.author: CSH

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but not for me
items.body: Material is very silky and kind of on the thin side, not great for the winter wedding I will be attending. The color is amazing but the length was a bit too long and looked matronly on me so I returned it. Also the material was very wrinkled, and would be hard to keep wrinkle free. Read more
items.author: Tracie Martineau

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fit!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress. I wore it on Christmas Eve to Church and then to a holiday party and it was so comfortable and chic. The only two issues were, one of the front buttons came off. They do provide and extra which was good and I just sewed it back on. And the other issue was it tends to bunch up in the mid section just a bit so I felt like I was constantly pulling it down. Also, important to note that the buttons are false buttons and do not actually unbotton. I actually bought this dress because I thought I could unbotton the top area easily and breastfeed my baby but it turned out the buttons at the top are not real buttons are are just there for show. Read more
items.author: MM1986

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed
items.body: So disappointed with the dress. The size was too small. Color is terrible, fabric is so thin, definitely not a dress for a Christmas event. I would NOT recommend this to anyone. Read more
items.author: Connie

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't look as good as shown
items.body: Very plain. Didn't look dressy enough for a wedding. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: A beautiful dress was as pictured and fit according to size recommendations. I got the black dress and it fits nicely. It is a thinner material so you could wear this dress spring, summer, or fall but the fabric is too thin to wear in the winter. I am 5’ 4” & weigh 140 & returned the small for a medium size. Read more
items.author: Paul & Barbara Martin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi V Neck Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Light Blue, Rose Red, Pink, White, Dark Blue, Black, Jujube Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
